attributes.action: Extend mortgage repayments plans for a further 3 to 5 years so people are not made homeless
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I feel that an increase in the time people have to pay their mortgages will help keep the repayment down to an offerable level and as long as they pay the minium amount theykeep their home

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
